parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the task. Fuzzy match is supported.

parameters.name: Owner
parameters.description: The account ID of the task owner.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: ProjectEnv
parameters.description:
The workspace environment.

Valid values:

*   Prod
*   Dev

parameters.name: RuntimeResource
parameters.description: The information about the resource group. Set this parameter to the ID of a resource group for scheduling.

parameters.name: SortBy
parameters.description:
The field that is used to sort tasks. This parameter is configured in the format of "Sorting field Sorting order". You can set the sorting order to Desc or Asc. If you do not specify the sorting order, Asc is used by default. Valid values:

*   `ModifyTime (Desc/Asc)`

*   `CreateTime (Desc/Asc)`

*   `Id (Desc/Asc)`

    Default value: `Id Desc`.

parameters.name: TaskType
parameters.description:
The type of the task. Valid values:

*   ODPS_SQL
*   SPARK
*   PY_ODPS
*   PY_ODPS3
*   ODPS_SCRIPT
*   ODPS_MR
*   COMPONENT_SQL
*   EMR_HIVE
*   EMR_MR
*   EMR_SPARK_SQL
*   EMR_SPARK
*   EMR_SHELL
*   EMR_PRESTO
*   EMR_IMPALA
*   SPARK_STREAMING
*   EMR_KYUUBI
*   EMR_TRINO
*   HOLOGRES_SQL
*   HOLOGRES_SYNC_DDL
*   HOLOGRES_SYNC_DATA

parameters.name: TriggerRecurrence
parameters.description:
The run mode when triggered. Valid only if TriggerType is Scheduler.

Valid values:

*   Pause
*   Skip
*   Normal

parameters.name: TriggerType
parameters.description:
The trigger type.

Valid values:

*   Scheduler: Triggered by schedule.
*   Manual: Triggered manually.

parameters.name: WorkflowId
parameters.description: The ID of the workflow to which the task belongs.
